name: DiRosa, Appellant, v. Spring Mountain Winter Sports, Inc.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: DiRosa, Appellant, v. Spring Mountain Winter Sports, Inc.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: William P. Manning, Jr., with him Wright, Spencer, Manning & Sagendorph, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
DiRosa, Appellant, v. Spring Mountain Winter Sports, Inc.
